metadata.synopsis: This AD plays during the Ketheric Showdown in the lower Colony, when the player kills Isobel during the combat. Ketheric will react to this in human form.
metadata.how_to_trigger: This AD plays during the Ketheric Showdown in the lower Colony. It will play on Ketheric if Isobel is killed during the combat.- Load SCL_Main_A- Using ReCon command "oe KethericShowdown_Start"  to teleport yourself there.- Use command "oe KethericShowdown_AudienceRoute" to make sure Isobel is here, and tadpoled.- Go through the dialog, approach Ketheric, go through that dialog too. Combat will start.- To check the Apostle form version, use "oe KethericShowdown_Transform".- Kill Isobel (either through ReCon or in-game combat). This AD will play on Ketheric.

1.speaker: GROUP_Act2_Ketheric
1.context: NodeContext: More fury than grief. We killed his daughter - but he'll bring her back again

0.speaker: GROUP_Act2_Ketheric
0.text: My Lord brought her back once already. Your death will be final.
